first.subject: Re: A few incidients
text: There have been a few incidents
Regarding ACME products.
I've given you access to the Footage app.
Please review the footage of the incidents.
We need these folks "Alive"...
Thanks,
MGMT

second.subject: Re: Codes
text: Hey there, newbie!
How is your first day going?
In this place we keep lots of secrets...
You'll need to utilize the CODE MAN app.
I've given you access to it.
There are CLUES to our codes everywhere.
Explore and find them!
GL HF on your first day
Bill from HR

easterEggs.subject: Re: Sick Games
text: Yo, I heard you did good today.
Me and the crew have some secret games
installed on the netweork.
I gave you access to a few new apps.
Check your desktop!
It's games from the js13k game jam!!
Game on yo
Kenny from the basement

third.subject: Re: Thanks for playing!
text: Hey thanks for playing our game!
We hope you enjoyed it.
Have a great rest of your day!
The Dev Team
